post:
HostSlick.com has a simple aim. We provide our customers with high quality servers but keep prices down. We own Hardware and Network in Lelystad, Netherlands and have an average ticket response time of around 25-45 minutes at most.
Our goals are to offer our valued clients a great experience and offer the best Affordable and most Reliable Hosting arround.

Why HostSlick?

  • All VPS Nodes with Intel XEON E3, E5 or better and RAID10 arrays
  • Fastest SSDs. No Slow HD on dedis
  • Easy-to-use Control Panels for both VPS and Dedicated Servers
  • Flexibility - You can upgrade/downgrade anytime. Custom quotes possible
  • Wide range of Payment methods accepted: PayPal, Credit Card, Bitcoin and more!
  • 100Gbps Corero SmartWalls DDoS Protection
  • Additional IPs on request at anytime!
  • We Colocate with Datacenters and own all our Hardware, IPs and Network.
  • … many more!
